text:
- Now, if you're like me,
you love routine videos,

morning routine, evening,
afternoon, whatever.
Because it's fascinating to get a glimpse
into people's daily lives.

This morning routine video
is a little bit different

because it's all about
that Airstream living.

Myself, my husband, our two
and a half year old daughter

and our dog Atlas all live
together in a, not once,
but twice renovated vintage Airstream
that's 200 square feet of space.
Before we get into our morning routine,

I want to give a special
thanks to our sponsor, Evive.

I'm going to be telling you a
bit more about them shortly.
(calm music)
(upbeat music)

The sun is shining and
we all wake up together.

Just kidding, that does not
happen. (record scratch)

It's actually Kai jumping
on my face waking me up,

elbowing me, kissing me,
playing with my hair,

pulling my hair, whatever
she could do to get me up.
And then Atlas comes, joins, licks me.

Everyone's coming for
me, and Sia, untouched,

rolled up in his burrito,
gets to sleep in.

And then we get out of bed
and we step a good five feet
into the kitchen.

We like to start the day first
thing by hydrating our bodies

with some water,
sometimes water and lemon,
as well as take our vitamins.

After we have some water,
we open up the blinds,
we let the sun in.
Ah, it feels so good.
Light, sunshine, vitamin D, give it to me!
We let Atlas go pee, we go pee.

And then we feed Atlas and
then we get into coffee
and breakfast making.
(calm music)
I have been committed to smoothies
for at least the past six years.

Every single morning, I have
a smoothie, without fail.
No matter where I am in the world.

One of the first things I
do when I get to a new place

is I go to Google Maps
and I type in smoothie bar

or like juice bar, anything
that relates to smoothies

so I know where to go if I need
to in the morning. (laughs)

While strolling through
the grocery store one day
I went to the frozen fruit section
and discovered Evive for the first time.
And I'm so glad I did
because it totally fits into lifestyle.

This is what an Evive
smoothie wheel looks like.

It is packed with
goodness, healthy goodness,

and it tastes delicious,
it looks beautiful.
This one's my favorite, mango omlaberry
it is made with blue spirulina,
so it has that bright blue color.
And also spirulina is really good for you

among so many other ingredients
that are clean, vegan.

That's what I'm looking
for when I buy anything.
And most importantly,
I know every single ingredient in this.
There aren't words that I'm like,
what, what am I consuming? What?

You don't even need a blender
to make an Evive smoothie,
which makes it great for travel as well.

You just pop it into a
glass, a little bit of liquid
of your choice, and then as it melts,
as the cubes melt, you just shake it up
and there you go, you're good to go.
I like using a blender when I can,
because I like to make it a little thicker
to make a smoothie bowl.
That's our go-to right now in the morning

is our smoothie bowls because
Kai loves putting the toppings

on top and it's just more
fun to eat a smoothie
with a spoon.
(upbeat music)

Evive smoothies are a
hundred percent plant-based,

they are easy and quick to
make, they're nutritious,
they have high quality ingredients,

so organic fruits, and
vegetables, super foods,
and proteins in each smoothie.
And there's no added sugar, thank you!

I hate when I get a smoothie
and it's had sugar added to it.
Why, why?

There are no artificial
flavors or preservatives,

it's gluten free, it's
non-GMO, certified organic.

That is basically everything
that I live for. (laughs)
But really it is.

I love that you can do so
much with Evive smoothies too,

you can make popsicles,
smoothie bowl, smoothies,
ice cream.
You can just eat the cubes full on,
eat the cubes as they are.
Once smoothie bowls are ready,

the smell of coffee is
lingering in the air.
Sia magically appear. (laughs)
He's sleeps in more than me.

Anyways, he rolls out a bed,
he joins us for breakfast.
It's great.

It's really nice to be
living in an Airstream

and the outdoors feels
just as much as our home
as the indoors.
We spend as much time outside as possible.

That's just part of this
lifestyle and that's what we love.
We love being close to nature.
(upbeat music)
After breakfast, I bring in the dishes

and I bring them to the
sink to go and wash them.
No I don't, I lie. (laughs)

I actually pile them up and
see Sia does them later.
Gotta take a little, give a little,
he got to sleep in, he does the dishes.
Kai has already brushed her teeth,
Sia's brushed his teeth, gotten ready.
(upbeat music)
While I get ready to workout,
Cia and Kai take Atlas for a poop walk.

A great way to start the
day, moving their bodies.

And when they get back,
Atlas joins me for a run.
He's been coming with me often,
which has made running way more enjoyable.
Any way to start my day off moving my body
has become really important to me
and has become part of my life.
(upbeat music)
After we've all moved our bodies,
we come back to the Airstream
and either I'll get some work done
or Sia will get some work done.

We like to take turns each
day, alternating each day.

And whoever's working is
working at the computer

or filming or doing
whatever needs to be done,

and the other one is with Kai
playing and just enjoying her,
being in her world,

which is a wonderful
imaginative world to be in.

Everything's getting done,
everyone's enjoying life
and it's pretty nice.

This is our way of finding
that life work balance,

alternating days with Kai
and work and it feels good.
I mean, it doesn't always go like that,
especially being on the road
and travel days are completely different.

Each day is actually
a little bit different
because of our lifestyle.

We do struggle still with
that work-life balance,

but when we're in this
routine alternating days,
it feels really good.
Once I've done a little bit of work,

I close the laptop and then
we're all ready to go out
and spend some time together.
We love to be outside in nature,
so whatever that means to us that day.

And that is a glimpse into
our slow, beautiful, peaceful,

delicious, and often chaotic
mornings in our Airstream home.

Thanks again to Evive for
sponsoring this video,
you are delicious.

Everyone is so fascinating to me.
So yeah, share below.
Bye.
